alert.note: Alert for Yabucoa (Puerto Rico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS San Juan (San Juan, Puerto Rico)
info.headline: Flood Advisory issued April 08 at 7:51AM ADT until April 08 at 9:30AM ADT by NWS San Juan
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 AM AST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Maunabo, Patillas and Yabucoa. * WHEN...Until 900 AM AST. * IMPACTS...Rises in small streams and rivers. Water over roadways. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 648 AM AST, Runoff from previous rains in addition to ongoing thunderstorm activity will continue to result in urban and small stream flooding. Soils are already saturated, landslides are possible. - Additional rainfall amounts of 1 to 3 inches are expected over the area. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
